lyrics:
2 contributorssummer love lyricsverse 1
ridin in the drop top with the top down
saw you switchin lanes girl
pull up to the red light lookin right
come here let me get your name girl
tell me where you from what you do what you like
let me pick your brain girl
and tell me how they got that pretty little face
on that pretty little frame girl
but let me show you round let me take you out

cause we can do it fast fast slow
whichever way you wanna run girl
but let mе buy you drinks better yet rings
do it how you want it donе girl
and who wouldve thought that you could be the one cause i

chorus
i cant wait to fall in love with you
you cant wait to fall in love with me
this just cant be summer love youll see
this just cant be summer love love

verse 2

any way you want it done girl

make you wanna say my name girl

cant get you off my brain girl
but who wouldve thought that you could be the one cause i
